Text: Here is the thing guys, there are very little people that even download these so we need to seed forever!
what an amazin' download. came through in about 40 minutes, plugged my HDD straight in my samsung tv and wallop. no dramas, all good. thanks so much.

played seamlessly on Samsung 3DTV using the included set of active-3D glasses: copy to external USB disk and then plug in TV. If not auto-detected as 3D content, then click on remote's 3D button, select "side-by-side".
